alert.note: Alert for Daniels (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Daniels County through 830 PM MDT... At 745 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Port Of Scobey, or 12 miles northwest of Scobey, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Of Scobey and Four Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
